turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello. how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to make an order at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which starbucks did u want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the Starbucks on Cole Street in Oaks, Pennsylvania.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. and what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I put whole milk in it and sugar?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. u want 1 cappuccino with whole milk and sugar from starbucks on cole street in pennsylvania.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $3.45 is the total. did u want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're all set. the order has been placed. it'll b ready for pick up in 10 minutes. the receipt has been sent to u via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That is all. Thank you.
